trans-unit.source: Specifies the values that resolve a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os valores que resolvam um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> usando o protocolo PNRP API do provedor de Namespace.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> which contains all the information for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> that was published in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>que contém todas as informações para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>que foi publicado no <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>ou cloud(s) que foram consultados durante o processo de resolução.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância padrão do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: After successfully resolving a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> contains all the information for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Depois de resolver com êxito um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>contém todas as informações de especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>que foram publicada a cloud(s) foram consultados durante a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>operação.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution data after the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Retorna dados de resolução após o ponto a ponto o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é um retorno de chamada assíncrono usado para processar os dados de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto, após a resolução de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event is raised by the peer resolver object.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados podem substituir esse método para executar mais tarefas quando a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>é gerado pelo objeto resolvedor peer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the data returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados retornados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution progress data when the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Retorna dados de progresso de resolução ponto a ponto quando o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é um retorno de chamada assíncrono usado para processar os dados de resolução de pares após a solicitação do progresso de resolução de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados podem substituir esse método para executar mais tarefas quando a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref>objeto que contém informações de progresso do par nome resolução retornadas pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o par de chamada.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Esse método associa um nome de ponto a ponto para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de ponto a ponto não pode ser resolvido ou é `null`, uma <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>método é semelhante a chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método para cada registro de nome de par de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Observe que usando o método de resolução em um registro de nome de ponto a ponto individuais não invalidará resolver vários nomes de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro não for fornecido, o método usa o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher os parâmetros de nuvem.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os registros de nome de ponto a ponto (representado como <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos) associado com o nome de ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> podem ser registrados por usuários diferentes no mesmo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>e associados a diferentes pontos de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do par especificado não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Resolve o nome de ponto especificado em todas as nuvens conhecido para o par de chamada, retornando não mais do que o número especificado de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Esse método associa um nome de ponto a ponto para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para o nome do par.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome de ponto a ponto pode ser registrado por usuários diferentes no mesmo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>e associados a diferentes pontos de extremidade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>não pode ser resolvido (por exemplo, o nome de ponto a ponto não está publicado) um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects to obtain from all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> objects for the supplied `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos para obter todos <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> objetos para fornecido `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: Um cujo tamanho é menor ou igual a maxRecords entradas.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém registros de nome de ponto a ponto associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> que foi resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é menor ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do par fornecido não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>especificado na <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>não pode ser resolvido (ou seja, o nome do par não está publicado) um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>usa o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the peer name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> no qual resolver o nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref>que contém todos os registros de nome de ponto a ponto (representado como <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos) associado com o nome de ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> podem ser registrados por usuários diferentes no mesmo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>e associados a diferentes pontos de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do par fornecido não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>especificado na <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>, retornando não mais do que o número especificado de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de ponto a ponto não pode ser resolvido, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>usa o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> no qual resolver o `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of peer name record objects to obtain from the specified cloud for the specified `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de objetos de registro de nome ponto a ponto para obter a nuvem especificada especificado `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: Um cujo tamanho é menor ou igual a maxRecords entradas.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém registros de nome de ponto a ponto associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> que foi resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é menor ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do par fornecido não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto assíncrono especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o par de chamada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Esse método assincronamente associa um nome de ponto a ponto para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: It raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, ele gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de ponto a ponto não pode ser resolvido, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>método é semelhante a chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método para cada registro de nome de par de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Observe que usando o método de resolução em um registro de nome de ponto a ponto individuais não invalidará resolver vários nomes de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono e o método de solução destina-se ao processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolvedor sejam coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isso `userState` identificador de token ou mensagem permite que um sistema operacional para entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de recebimento depois que a mensagem foi colocada na fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains state information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo usuário que contém informações de estado sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros são definidos como .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than maxRecords entries for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto assíncrono especificado em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o par de chamada, retornando não mais de maxRecords entradas para o nome do par.

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Esse método assincronamente associa um nome de ponto a ponto para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de ponto a ponto não pode ser resolvido ou é `null`, uma <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, ele gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono e o método de solução destina-se ao processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolvedor sejam coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isso `userState` identificador de token ou mensagem permite que um sistema operacional para entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de recebimento depois que a mensagem foi colocada na fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain for the Peer Name.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de registros para obter o nome do par.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo usuário que contém informações sobre a operação resolver.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros são definidos como .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é menor ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto assíncrono especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, ele gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o nome é resolvido usando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho, que inicializa valores padrão para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono e o método de solução destina-se ao processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolvedor sejam coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isso `userState` identificador de token ou mensagem permite que um sistema operacional para entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de recebimento depois que a mensagem foi colocada na fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> no qual resolver o `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário definido <xref:System.Object>que contém informações sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros são definidos como .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto assíncrono especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resolution operation will resolve no more than maxRecords entries for the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: A operação de resolução resolverá não mais de maxRecords entradas para o nome de ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de ponto a ponto segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registrado (e associado a diferentes pontos de extremidade) por diferentes pares na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, ele gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, que chama o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o nome é resolvido usando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho, que inicializa valores padrão para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: Suas listas de parâmetros são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token do sistema para manipulação de eventos assíncrono e o método de solução destina-se ao processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolvedor peer sejam coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isso `userState` identificador de token ou mensagem permite que um sistema operacional para entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de recebimento depois que a mensagem foi colocada na fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento será gerado se a operação resolver é concluído em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The `peerName` to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O `peerName` para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The `cloud` in which to resolve `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O `cloud` no qual resolver `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain from `cloud` for `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de registros a serem obtidos `cloud` para `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo usuário que contém informações sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros são definidos como .

trans-unit.source: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais parâmetros fornecidos são inválidos.

trans-unit.source: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
trans-unit.target: A conclusão bem-sucedida dessa operação requer pelo menos um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é menor ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Cancelar a solicitação de resolução de nome de par assíncrona especificada.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método garante que o sistema não tentará obter registros adicionais para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> especificado

trans-unit.source: If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP).
trans-unit.target: Se esse método é chamado quando uma operação de resolução de nome do par assíncrona não estiver pendente, ele atua como uma "nenhuma operação" (não operações).

trans-unit.source: The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress.
trans-unit.target: O `userState` objeto deve ser fornecido, pois ele é usado para rastrear uma chamada assíncrona específica quando várias chamadas estão em andamento.

trans-unit.source: This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto fornecido pelo chamador é exclusivo para cada solicitação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retornará imediatamente, mas a operação pode ou não pode cancelar imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento retornados pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento contém um campo que pode ser controlado por clientes para determinar se o cancelamento tenha ocorrido.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método garante que o evento ResolveCompleted será sinalizado assim que possível com o argumento do evento <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object provided to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> method instance which started the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: O objeto fornecido para a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>instância de método que iniciou a operação resolver.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The userState parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: O userState parâmetros não podem ser .

trans-unit.source: The ResolveCompleted event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: O evento ResolveCompleted é sinalizado quando uma solicitação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto para um determinado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento será gerado uma vez para cada ponto de extremidade encontrado e esse evento será gerado apenas uma vez quando todos os pontos de extremidade foram encontrados.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event will also be raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento também será gerado se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>operação realizada em erro ou for cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: This event is signaled whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> object is found in response to a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> operation for a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é sinalizado sempre que um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objeto for localizado em resposta a um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>operação para um determinado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> found.
trans-unit.target: Se vários <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objetos existem no cloud(s) que está sendo consultada, esse evento é sinalizado uma vez para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>encontrado.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
